definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: The utility model can effectively avoid foreign odor and harmful gas emitted by the contamination of the drain.

sentences.english: Guangzhou is expected to take the lead in collecting light pollution fees in the country.

sentences.english: Water will be drawn from underground wells and there are suitable outlets for effluent discharge.
